Nightshift slowly skulks into view with his tail held low.

" Oh slag, ther=
e goes my cover.  Oh well at least we werent attacked.  Better play along w=
ith her."

He follows the insectile queen with a twitch of his tail.  His w=
hiskers twitch with anxiety.

" Um, if ya don't mind me ask'n, why did ya h=
ave the tower fire at us?  This is Maximal territory. "

Don't be envious o=
f what you don't have, be grateful for things you already posses.  Nothing =
is worth more than family and friends.

On Nov 23, 2011, at 2:27 PM, Super =
Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Nightshift say=
s not one word, but takes a look around. He was not about to
> > move too q=
uickly and knew it would be trouble if he did. Yet he transmits
> > via tex=
t to Polarclaw and Wolfgang.
> >
> > " No go'n back now, door just shut beh=
ind us. Anyway, the area looks
> > deserted. Everything appears untouched, =
and no prints anywhere. I ain't
> > gonna buy the all clear line just yet, =
because this could be a trap. If it
> > looks too easy, don't buy into it. =
Batscout, see if you can pick up any
> > unknown signatures. I ain't convin=
ced that we're alone."
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> BATSCOUT nodded his little head as h=
e winged his way towards the far
> door and then moving around the room. "I=
 am detecting something
> strange." he said in his synthesized voice. "It d=
etects as Unicronian
> and then alien."
> 
> Even as BATSCOUT returned to N=
IGHTSHIFT's position the far door
> clicked and then opened. "Greetings." A=
 feminine voice said to
> NIGHTSHIFT, it was the alien insectile queen's vo=
ice, the one that had
> encountered in the tunnels way back, as well as the=
 same queen who had
> been fighting MAURADER in the wilderness. The voice w=
as coming over
> his radio. "I recognize you. Come."
> 
> As the far door o=
pened, the one that led further into the base. At the
> threshold two Insec=
tile troopers stood looking at NIGHTSHIFT silently
> with large compound ey=
es and weapons lowered.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> - Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-452B2147-A894-401A-9E7B-98501A9AABF4

into view with his tail held low.</div><div><br></div><div>" Oh slag, there=
 goes my cover.  Oh well at least we werent attacked.  Better pla=
y along with her."</div><div><br></div><div>He follows the insectile queen =
with a twitch of his tail.  His whiskers twitch with anxiety.</div><di=
v><br></div><div>" Um, if ya don't mind me ask'n, why did ya have the tower=
 fire at us?  This is Maximal territory. "<br><br>Don't be envious of =
what you don't have, be grateful for things you already posses.  Nothi=
ng is worth more than family and friends.</div><div><br>On Nov 23, 2011, at=

      <p>> <OLD><br>
&g=
t;<br>
> Nightshift says not one word, but takes a look around.  He was =
not about to<br>
> move too quickly and knew it would be trouble if he d=
id.  Yet he transmits<br>
> via text to Polarclaw and Wolfgang.<br>
>=
<br>
> " No go'n back now, door just shut behind us.  Anyway, the area l=
ooks<br>
> deserted.  Everything appears untouched, and no prints anywhe=
re.  I ain't<br>
> gonna buy the all clear line just yet, because this c=
ould be a trap.  If it<br>
> looks too easy, don't buy into it.  Batscou=
t, see if you can pick up any<br>
> unknown signatures.  I ain't convinc=
ed that we're alone."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
BATSCOUT nodded his lit=
tle head as he winged his way towards the far<br>
door and then moving arou=
nd the room. "I am detecting something<br>
strange." he said in his synthes=
ized voice. "It detects as Unicronian<br>
and then alien."<br>
<br>
Even as=
 BATSCOUT returned to NIGHTSHIFT's position the far door<br>
clicked and th=
en opened. "Greetings." A feminine voice said to<br>
NIGHTSHIFT, it was the=
 alien insectile queen's voice, the one that had<br>
encountered in the tun=
nels way back, as well as the same queen who had<br>
been fighting MAURADER=
 in the wilderness. The voice was coming over<br>
his radio. "I recognize y=
ou. Come."<br>
<br>
As the far door opened, the one that led further into t=
he base. At the<br>
threshold two Insectile troopers stood looking at NIGHT=
SHIFT silently<br>
with large compound eyes and weapons lowered.<br>

TAG)<br>
